about_the_game:
Join our Discord community and experience the excitement of witnessing development updates in real-time as they happen. This game is a labor of love, and we invite you to be a part of our server where you can engage directly with our talented developers who have been developing this game since 2022!

We have so much to come in terms of levels and world building, and we can't wait to share it all with you!

HERD UP~!

Bark, Howl and Herd your way to herding those critters to the pens, but watch out for those stubborn animals in your way!

Play locally with up to 4 pups together! Earn those big treats for those sweet puppy rewards!

Remember to always pet your doggos!

It’s herdin’-fer-hire time with Cowboy Maloy! Control a cute and colorful variety of herdin’ dogs to complete missions and earn that much coveted vacation for all. Watch out for hazards and wild animals which shake up the flow and cause mayhem. Explore varied terrain and missions to unlock fun costumes, earn the best ranking, and find out what happens when the job’s done.
